svg.text: Complete the exercise below to check your understanding of what you learned in Section 2.
If you have questions, consult the Language Reference section.
be used in the following sentences? Choose Yes or No.
(érqiě) is used to add more similar or supporting
(érqiě) is not used to give different or contrasting descriptions.
component usually appears on the left side of a character. Many
characters with this component have something to do with walking or
Which of the following characters contain
这本书很简单，______ 很贵。
那本书很有意思，______ 很便宜。
